date.label: Countdown Date
date.info: Date Format should be DD/MM/YYYY and should be future date

bgcolor2.label: Background Color 2
bgcolor2.info: Select both colors for Gradient background

bgimage.label: Background Image
bgimage.info: Only Applicable with with Background Style option Image

header_style.label: For large menu please use Full width Navigation Style

logo_position.label: Logo Alignment
logo_position.info: Only Applicable if Full Width Menu is selected

menu_position.label: Menu Alignment
menu_position.info: Only Applicable if Full Width Menu is selected

menu_bgcolor.label: Menu Background Color
menu_bgcolor.info: Only Applicable if Full Width Menu is selected

menu_textcolor.label: Menu Text Color
menu_textcolor.info: Only Applicable if Full Width Menu is selected

enable_sticky_header.label: Enable sticky header
enable_sticky_header.info: Header shows on the screen as customers scroll up.

paragraph.content: Highlights will be visible on mobile only. To Check Hightlights, Go to last image of Product Gallery

heading.label: Heading
heading.info: A heading is required to display the menu.

header__2.info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your theme settings.
To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

search_style.label: Search Drawer Style
search_style.info: Change the Style of the search drawer

shipping_text.label: Message
shipping_text.info: Use ||amount|| to display the amount within the message.

enable_preorder.label: Enable Preorder
enable_preorder.info: Preorder will work when product has enabled continue when out of stock option
